name: Blend
description: Blend two chosen image steps with the given function. Defaults to using the red channel from image 1 and the green and blue and alpha channels of image 2. Easier to use interfaces coming soon!

offset.desc: Choose which image to blend the current image with. Two steps back is -2, three steps back is -3 etc.

blend.desc: Function to use to blend the two images.
blend.default: function(r1, g1, b1, a1, r2, g2, b2, a2) { return [ r1, g2, b2, a2 ] }
